message: It has been said that King Luthor destroyed the sword so that it would not fall into the wrong hands.

message: It would seem that either he, or the stories have not been telling the truth.

message: If restored, anyone wielding it would make their enemies tremble from only the sight of it.

message: You must destroy it, of course. Here, put it into my smelting pit and we'll be rid of it.

message: You can't be serious. It needs to be destroyed!

message: I.. what? Are you threatening me?

message: Sigh. You don't know what you are getting yourself into, kid.

message: Regardless, to restore the sword to its former shape, I'd need some of those crystals that it was adorned with, and those crystals are really hard to come by.

message: I think they are called Oegyth or something like that. The sword had three of them on its hilt.

message: You continue to amaze me. Now, are you really sure that you want to do this? The lives of the people that it has slain will haunt you.
